author: hustla187
title: USA! USA!
review: I am not a fan of soccer, but when I got this, it was actually pretty cool. It has 5 players including a goalie. The exterior of the bus is nice but the inside is not as great. If you want to make international teams, this is the way to do it. 5 out of 5.

author: asianlego
title: Awesome bus!
review:
This bus is one of the awesomest vehicles out there back then.. even though it looks slightly juniorized. The roof has been given the best details they could but it looks abit cluttered. I have converted my friend's team bus into a RV and this bus is the one for the job! If you want a bus or an RV (convert it yourself as a MOC) I recommend you to get this one.

-asianlego

author: Yoda____
title: classic
review: MY sister got this set and she doesn't even like football. the bus was done well and this set has a lot of figures which actually surprised me. the football itself is great and the window pieces look really cool the bus is a good size and it can fit on a road which is a bonus.
